Package com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry

Class Summary
Circle An ellipse in which the length and width are the same.
Ellipse An ellipse that can have a length and width.
Line A line class.
Point A point shape.
Polygon A shape with any amount of sides.
Rectangle A rectangle shape.
Shape The abstraction of all shapes.
Star  
Triangle A triangle shape; 3 sides.
Vector2f A class for 2-dimensional vectors.
